title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1242.14 - Berth assignment permits; location of berth
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1242.14 - Berth assignment permits; location of berth

State Regulations

No watercraft shall be docked or berthed at or made fast
to a public wharf or in any dock, slip, basin or other waterway adjacent to any
such structure, except at the location assigned to such watercraft by the Port

Authority, or in such manner as to endanger unreasonably or be likely to
endanger unreasonably persons or property. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1242.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
